text: Is there a way to give a Unitful units to an array instead than to each element individually? In my use case I load the data from file (both the numeric values and the unit) so the unit isn't known at compile time. I'm a bit worried about performance since using the usual Unitful way will result in non-inferrable element type of the whole array. On the other hand I really just want to use the unit once when plotting, so for that part performance is not critical.
